fields.description: Oversees the company's strategic direction and overall performance.
Leads the technical team, manages technical resources, and ensures innovation and scalability of the app.
Supervises operational aspects of the company, focusing on efficiency and processes.
Manages the development team, assigns technical tasks, and ensures timely delivery of technical solutions.
Builds, maintains, and improves the app's functionality.
Analyzes business needs, gathers requirements, and ensures alignment with the app's goals.
Reviews and verifies driver profiles, documents, and driving records for approval.
Handles day-to-day management, including coordinating between drivers and riders, and resolving operational challenges.
Manages vehicle assignments, maintenance schedules, and ensures vehicle compliance with legal standards.
Drives campaigns, improves user acquisition, and manages app visibility in the market.
Extracts and analyzes data to identify trends, optimize operations, and inform strategic decisions.
Assists users and drivers with inquiries, complaints, and issue resolution.
Oversees payment processing, ensures secure transactions, and handles refunds.
